casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jason Eric TAYLOR No. 399P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Ms. Rana Badwan, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina. Mr. James Bernier, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina. Mr. Paul E. Smith, Attorney at Law, For Taylor, Jason Eric. Mr. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of November 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
